title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Searching via Package view selection and dialog does not return any results.
OB: When searching for declarations via Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: When searching for declarations via Package view selection and dialog, the search should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR: To fix this issue, modify the search algorithm to prioritize retrieving the Java element during search. If retrieval fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name. Also, verify that search via the context menu in the packages view is working correctly.
